summary: A fallen professional wrestling superstar battles his past demons in a struggle to reclaim his life and the family that has given up on him.
cast: Steve Austin|Louie Benson|Joe Case|Adam Copeland|Ted DiBiase|Jim Duggan|Cody Hall|Scott Hall|Chris Jericho|Gene Okerlund|Dallas Page|Dustin Rhodes|Jake Roberts|Jim Ross|Brandy Smith|Steve Yu|Richard Blood|James J. Dillon|Mick Foley|Ivan Koloff|Rob Van Dam
title: The Resurrection of Jake the Snake
